attributes.action: Allow Learner Drivers to continue to practise
attributes.additional_details: I am a learner driver and have had my test cancelled twice now, with the possibility of a 3rd time. I am also an NHS worker and need to pass my test when the time comes. I have been practising with my husband when we go to work and shopping etc but now I am not allowed to do that, yet Scotland and Wales are allowing this?? Please let us Learner drivers continue. We are safe and as long as we are learning with someone in same household we are not mixing!!
attributes.background: Allow Learner Drives to continue practising with members of their own household during lockdown.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559063

Under current Government guidance, you can practise driving with members of your household or support bubble. It must be travel for work, education or other essential journeys: https://www.gov.uk/driving-lessons-learning-to-drive/practising-with-family-or-friends
